name: Cinque Terre Travel Guide
description: The ultimate travel resource for Cinque Terre, featuring comprehensive guides to all five villages, hiking trails, restaurants, hotels, weather information, and local culture.

landing-page.name: Landing Page
landing-page.description: Main entry point for the website or a section

prompts.writingPrompt: Create a compelling landing page that immediately captures the reader's attention and makes them want to explore Cinque Terre. Focus on the unique beauty and experiences available.

village-guide.name: Village Guide
village-guide.description: Comprehensive guide to a Cinque Terre village

prompts.writingPrompt: Write a comprehensive guide to this village that helps travelers plan their visit. Include historical context, must-see attractions, local tips, and practical information. Make it feel personal and authentic.

topic-page.name: Topic Page
topic-page.description: Focused page on a specific topic (hiking, restaurants, weather, etc.)

prompts.writingPrompt: Create an in-depth resource page on this specific topic. Provide actionable information, insider tips, and help travelers make informed decisions.

restaurants.name: Restaurants
restaurants.description: Restaurant data for Cinque Terre villages

prompts.researchPrompt: Research this restaurant using official sources, review sites (TripAdvisor, Google, Yelp), and local guides. Verify current opening hours, menu highlights, and recent reviews.
prompts.writingPrompt: Write an honest, helpful review that helps travelers decide if this restaurant suits their needs. Include atmosphere, signature dishes, price range, and practical tips.

accommodations.name: Accommodations
accommodations.description: Hotels, B&Bs, and apartments in Cinque Terre

prompts.researchPrompt: Research this accommodation using booking sites (Booking.com, TripAdvisor, Airbnb), official website, and recent reviews. Verify amenities, pricing, and current availability.
prompts.writingPrompt: Write a balanced review that helps travelers choose the right accommodation. Highlight what makes it special, who it's best suited for, and any potential drawbacks.

hikes.name: Hiking Trails
hikes.description: Hiking trails in and around Cinque Terre

prompts.researchPrompt: Research this hiking trail using official Cinque Terre park information, hiking guides, and recent traveler reports. Verify current trail status, difficulty, and any closures.
prompts.writingPrompt: Create a practical hiking guide that helps travelers plan their hike. Include trail conditions, difficulty level, scenic highlights, and essential tips.

events.name: Events
events.description: Festivals, events, and celebrations in Cinque Terre

prompts.researchPrompt: Research this event using official tourism sources, local news, and community calendars. Verify dates, times, and any participation requirements.
prompts.writingPrompt: Write an engaging description that captures the atmosphere and cultural significance of this event. Help travelers understand what to expect and how to participate.

pois.name: Points of Interest
pois.description: Attractions and notable places in Cinque Terre

prompts.researchPrompt: Research this point of interest using travel guides, official sources, and visitor reviews. Gather historical context, visiting hours, and visitor tips.
prompts.writingPrompt: Write an informative description that brings this place to life. Include historical significance, what makes it special, and practical visiting information.

travel-homepage.name: Travel Homepage
travel-homepage.description: Dramatic full-bleed homepage with hero, destination grid, features, testimonial, and CTA

ai_hints.style: Full-bleed dramatic imagery with overlay gradient
Image-forward cards with hover effects and overlay text

destination-collection.name: Destination Collection
destination-collection.description: Grid layout for browsing multiple destinations with filtering

ai_hints.style: Large image cards with overlay text, 2-3 columns

destination-detail.name: Destination Detail
destination-detail.description: Comprehensive destination page with hero, content sections, gallery, and FAQ

experience-page.name: Experience Page
experience-page.description: Immersive page for activities and experiences with image grid hero

ai_hints.style: Multiple images in grid layout with overlay
